value.0:
Demon Summoning - Anonymous.

The process that's involved here is dangerous and an ultimate evil. Its sheer act can drive a man to tears. My work will be sent to Eliminster the Mage so that he may ponder my findings. The components used here are rare and terribly expensive, and cannot be found in any local apothecary. 

Stage one:
Draw the standard summoning symbol on the ground; be careful to not leave out any of the detail. [Disc illustration provided.]

Stage two:
Set up braziers in a star shape around the summoning circle; place one exactly in the center of the circle.

Stage three: 
Place your components of magical uses in the brazier, I used a bloodstone but other components include a rakshasa's eye or some dragon's blood.

Stage three: 
Light the surrounding braziers with normal fire; magical fire will harm the demon, so light the component with magical fire. Do NOT use holy fire.

Stage four: 
Cast circle against evil on yourself, then the demon won't perceive you as a threat. If you do not cast this spell the summoned may become enraged by your presence.

Anecdote:
I have now summoned a demon, it'll arrive within the hour, and these notes are almost finished. I shall send this to the Archmage as soon as I'm done here. Before I forget though I shall now cast Protection against Evil toâ€¦ (The writing ends here and all that remains are splattered bloodstains.)
This black leatherbound book simply has no title, just a large red bloodstain.
